文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk1
证据片段: Zircon sand generally contains $1 \%$ to $3 \%$ of hafnium oxide related to zirconium oxide, sometimes more.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk1
证据片段: extractive distillation of zirconium chloride $( Z r C l _ { 4 } )$ and hafnium chloride (HfCls) in a solvent made of molten potassium chloridealuminum chloride (KCl-AICl3) mixture above $3 5 0 \%$ at atmospheric pressure

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk1
证据片段: The flow of solvent made of melted $K C l - A l C l _ { 3 }$ , circulated from top to bottom, is less than 10 000 litres per hour

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk1
证据片段: the column is maintained about $3 5 0 \textdegree$ as consistently as possible

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk2
证据片段: enriched in hafnium tetrachloride $3 0 \%$ to $5 0 \% \mathrm { H f } C \mathrm { l } _ { 4 }$ content)

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk2
证据片段: all stages of the process are run at atmospheric pressure

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk2
证据片段: This extraction system has a separation factor as high as 10 to 20 for zirconium and hafnium

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk2
证据片段: hafnium in the zirconium sponge obtained is reduced to less than ${ \mathfrak { s o } } { \mathfrak { p } } { \mathfrak { p } } { \mathfrak { m } }$

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_005_chunk2
证据片段: its solubility in water is small. about 20 ppm maximum
